section.title: CLAPACK
section.para: Download the latest CMake packaged version (clapack-X.Y.Z-CMAKE.tgz) from the project home page, then extract it. Navigate to the freshly created clapack folder, and install the package:
section.programlisting: cd clapack mkdir build cd build cmake .. make make install

section.title: GnuWin32
section.para: The dependencies of this category must be installed in the same folder; it is done automatically for the first two ones (as win32 installers exist), it has to be done manually for the last one.

section.title: bzip2
section.para: Download the latest bzip2-X.Y.Z-setup.exe from bzip2 download page and install it. Add [path/to/GnuWin32]/include and [path/to/GnuWin32]/lib to the environment Path variable.

section.title: libiconv
section.para:
Download the latest libiconv-X.Y.Z-1.exe from
libiconv download page and install it. As it will install in the same repository than bzip2, it is not necessary to change the path.

section.title: libXML2
section.para: Download the latest version (libxml2-X.Y.Z.win32.zip) at the XMLSoft download page and extract it. The resulting library folders (i.e. bin, include and lib) must be manually merged with the ones in GnuWin32 (see bzip2 paragraph above).

After this last package is installed, the GnuWin32 folder hierarchy should look like (with additional folders potentially existing around):
. |-- bin |-- include | `-- libxml `-- lib

section.title: Doxygen
section.para: Download the latest binary package (doxygen-X.Y.Z-setup.exe) at the Doxygen download page and install it.

section.title: Graphviz
section.para: Download the latest installer (graphviz-X.Y.msi) at the Graphviz download page and execute it.
